price: (64) So they returned to [blaming] themselves and said [to each other], "Indeed, you are the wrongdoers."
arabic: فَرَجَعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ أَنتُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: farajaʿū ilā anfusihim faqālū innakum antumu al-ẓālimūna
